TEI.2.document_title: J. E. B. Austin to Unknown, 05-26-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: J. E. B. Austin to E. R. Wightman, May 26, 1827. Contract to made a deed.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1646

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*J. E. B. Austin to E. R. Wightman, May 26, 1827. Contract to made a deed.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Be it known that I, *person_mentioned*James E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* an Inhabitant of *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned*s Colony*/location_mentioned* do hereby bind and obligate myself my *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*and assigns to make unto *person_mentioned*Elias K. Wightman*/person_mentioned* a deed for one fourth part of a league of land known as the *location_mentioned*Crownover league*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*on the west side of the river Colorado*/location_mentioned*, in Consideration of the same quantity of land deeded to me by said *person_mentioned*Wrightman */person_mentioned*from off the League of land granted to him by the *person_mentioned*Mexican Government*/person_mentioned*, the said *person_mentioned*Wightman */person_mentioned*to have the priviledge of making choice of either quarter of the Sd League: The said title to be made as soon as the *person_mentioned*parties*/person_mentioned* shall have made their respective selections—*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-26-1827">May 26th 1827.*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jas B Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Samuel M Williams*/person_mentioned* Attest*/p*
*p*Executed agreeably to contract */p* */div1*
